dialogue.text: The city has become my extended spiral. Every street curves back to the same eternal questions, and that's exactly how it should be.

psychological_notes: Complete integration—Evan now sees the spiral pattern in all of life. The city becomes extended practice space for consciousness. This shows how transformation doesn't require leaving ordinary life but seeing it with new eyes. Full acceptance of circular rather than linear existence.
philosophical_underpinning: Samsara as nirvana—ordinary life as spiritual practice
therapeutic_direction: Living the teaching—therapy fully integrated into daily life
